property.name: Light Control Regulator Kpu
property.description: This property represents the proportional coefficient K_p in an increasing output operation mode of a proportional-integral light controller. This represents the proportional coefficient when the light is increasing its light output — indicated by the third character, u (“up”), in Kpu, as opposed to the coefficient used when the light output is decreasing, indicated by the third character, d (“down”), in Kpd.
